Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2007 12:28AM horsegal wrote: Luann - I am new to this thread - but wanted to send my prayers your way.  My 23 yr old son just returned from Iraq 2 weeks ago - was there since Aug 2006.  It was definitely a tough time for all of us - him over there and me dealing with BC same time.  I will tell you that you do get to talk to them more than I thought I would.  Emails too.  And yes, someone else here was right in saying that letters and goodie boxes are such a treat for them.  I would not only send goodies to just my son, but also goodie boxes for his division - to share.  There always seems to be someone that doesn't get anything or not as much - and they so appreciated it! Good luck to you and your family -
Posts.Title: O/T My son is leaving for Iraq LuAnnH mrs_X_Sunneedazee
